name: Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: 2 14-ounce cans french cut green beans, drained well
1 small onion, sliced into very thin rings (2 1/2 ounces)
utensils: 1 1/2 quart casserole dish or 8x8 inch baking pan

instructions.en: Drain green beans and mushrooms well
instructions.sk: Dobre sceďte zelené fazuľky a huby
instructions.ja: インゲン豆とマッシュルームの水気をよく切る

instructions.en: Slice onion into very thin rings and finely chop celery
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte cibuľu na veľmi tenké krúžky a jemne nasekajte zeler
instructions.ja: 玉ねぎを薄切りにし、セロリを細かく刻む

instructions.en: Sauté onion, celery, and mushrooms in butter until very soft and slightly browned, about 20 minutes
instructions.sk: Opražte cibuľu, zeler a huby na masle, kým nezmäknú a mierne nezhnednú, asi 20 minút
instructions.ja: 玉ねぎ、セロリ、マッシュルームをバターで20分ほど柔らかくなり少し色づくまで炒める

instructions.en: Combine all ingredients in a greased 1 1/2 quart casserole or 8x8 inch baking pan
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte všetky ingrediencie vo vymastenej 1,5 litrovej zapekacej mise alebo 20x20 cm plechu na pečenie
instructions.ja: すべての材料を油を塗った1.5クォートのキャセロールまたは8x8インチの焼き皿に混ぜ合わせる

instructions.en: Bake uncovered at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes or until nicely browned and bubbly
instructions.sk: Pečte nezakryté pri teplote 175°C 30 minút alebo kým nezhnedne a nezačne bublať
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで30分間、または表面がきつね色になり泡立つまで蓋をせずに焼く
